activities: H2O Clinical, LLC (H2O) receives coded clinical trial data from the EU/EAA and Switzerland exported by pharmaceutical companies who sponsor these clinical trials.  H2O performs manual data entry, data cleaning and other data management, and statistical analysis of these coded clinical trial data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: manually processed data:  •	Case report forms (CRFs) which include particularly date of birth, initials, gender, subject ID, Study Sponsor's study number, name of site, and Principal Investigator name.  While not included on the CRFs themselves, site contact details are included in the CRF transmittal form.
